column4: how do you do it if you want to make make install in 1 line? do you use |
xchat
its not in ubuntu software center
i didnt feel like using apt-get
it is not there
also Synaptic is almost as easy as Software Center.
I'm seeing xchat-gnome in synaptic.  Synaptic is  a great way to install/uninstall packages.
what about the default ubuntu software center i do not see it in there, i also do not see anything about more sources i think i have all the sources checked
is synaptic that much better?
Synaptic is kind of the next step into the details of apt-get from Ubuntu Software Center.
So the easiest is Software Center, next is Synaptic, next dpkg, next command line apt-get, and much, much harder is building from source.
I'll check and see if I got it from a different repository.
i have looked i see xchat on synaptic, i will add it to my list of apps over the default ubuntu soft center
did you look at http://xfce-look.org/
I know what you mean re: terminal transparency.  I used to have Xubuntu installed, but not right now, so i can't check it, but
when you're looking at your terminal in xfce, does it have an edit menu?
yes and profile pref i will settle for cheap background transparency
so when you look at "Background" does it give you the option to use a transparent background?
yes but just to the desktop image i was asking about it showing everything under it
in the gnome terminal I have in front of me, there are three options, transparent being the third.  Do you have that?
yes dont worry about it i got it
I was in kinda the opposite situation last night where I couldn't figure out how to get away from transparent terminal.  I didn't really figure it out, but changed theme and it was ok.
